EmailTemplate.name: Dept of licensing-pending request to join firm
EmailTemplate.subject: Dept of Licensing - Pending request to join a firm
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Department of Licensing - Pending request to join a firm You have a pending request to join {!MUSW__Account_Contact__c.Title__c} . You have 7 days to accept or deny their request.
Please login to your account to act on this request: Login
This is an automated email. Replies to this email are not monitored. To make sure you get our emails, please set your email filter to accept email from dol.wa.gov Â© 2019 DOL
